item.title: CRDTs for Collaborative Writing
item.description: An introduction to Conflict-Free Replicated Data Types Init Journey and Journal These past months I’ve been helping out with technical screen interviews on the job, the regular 1-hour meeting in which the candidate is given a code challenge and must provide a decent working solution by the end of it. Surprisingly enough, the place I work at does not provide access to any interview platform to assess the candidate’s skills, leaving me in a tight spot.
